videoTitle: The ULTIMATE Guide to Mickey's Very Merry Christmas Party

characters and snacks overall we enjoyed
the party this year a lot and things
just generally seem to go smoothly with
the exception of Tiana&#39;s Bou Adventure
closing early for technical difficult
ulties we&#39;d still strongly recommend
this event especially if you&#39;re looking
to have a relaxing morning then taking
advantage of the 400 p.m. park access
that a party ticket grants
you so should you go Mickey&#39;s Very Merry
Christmas Party is a unique and super
fun event but that doesn&#39;t mean it&#39;s for
everyone you should go if you love
Christmas and Disney this is the most
christmy Disney can be this party
delivers on the Holly Dolly spirit for
sure now if you&#39;re visiting during those
earlier party dates you can still
celebrate the Hol even if you don&#39;t have
your tree up at home yet and maybe you
want to avoid the crowds the party won&#39;t
be empty but compared to a regular day
in the park during the holiday season
you may find a little more Breathing
Room during this event maybe you want a
lazy morning save a regular day ticket
and purchase one for the event instead
you can relax until you can get in at
400 p.m. or get some holiday shopping
done at Disney Springs now you should
skip the event if you&#39;re on a
significantly low budget this party is
expensive more so than a single a ticket
to Magic Kingdom and if you&#39;re looking
to do Disney on the cheap there are
plenty of ways to enjoy the holidays for
a lot less money sometimes zero money
also maybe you don&#39;t care about the

and single pass lightning Lanes during

even if you&#39;re not in a budget $150

buy a bunch of souvenirs eat at some of

if you&#39;ve planned your vacation around

spirit into high gear but like
everything at Disney world it&#39;s not for

even the non- Disney folks so that&#39;s a

we&#39;re going to do it all and we&#39;re going
